ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW SERIES! NEW HERO! The Grimm Universe is filled with heroes far and wide dealing with threats from vampires, werewolves, corrupt governmental organizations, to ancient orders battling for control of the realms of power.
But what lies in the deepest corners of our world could give the evilest creature nightmares. A threat since the beginning of time is rising and only one person will be there to stop it from destroying everything!
Working from the shadows a long lineage of warriors have been defending life from the darkness that exists and from that family of soldiers comes the newest ally in the war of monsters, Belle the Beast Hunter! Don't miss this new series as a new hero is introduced into the Grimm Universe!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Kyle Ritter | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Jorge Cortes | 2 | C | Cover C | Derlis Santacruz & Sanju Nivangune | 3 | D | Cover D | Riveiro & Mohan Sivakami | 4 | E | Blank Cover E | None | 5 | F | Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover F, Limited to 350 | Derlis Santacruz | 6 | G | Sci-Fi Box Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover G, Limited to 50 | Derlis Santacruz & Ceci de la Cruz | 7 |
